articles.author: ABDOULIE JOHN, JESSICA DONATI
articles.title: Gambia could become the first country to reverse a ban on female genital cutting - The Associated Press
articles.description: Lawmakers in Gambia have rejected for now an attempt to repeal a ban on female genital cutting, which would make the West African nation the first country anywhere to make that reversal. Activists in the largely Muslim country had warned that lifting the ban …
articles.content: ERREKUNDA, Gambia (AP) Lawmakers in Gambia on Monday rejected, for now, an attempt to repeal a ban on female genital cutting, which would make the West African nation the first country anywhere to ma… [+3953 chars]
